subject: Ghost Box Prophecies on The Haunted
author: mllejade
full_text:
There's a new television show on Animal Planet, featuring real life hauntings where animals are involved.  Last night was an episode entitled "Ghost Box Prophecies" where a paranormal team was called in in to investigate a haunting at a family home.  They used a hacked Radio Shack 469 (you can hear the clicking sound throughout).  What the shack hack predicted, however, seemingly came true.  This was the 3rd episode in the new series - it repeats this week, as do the first two episodes.  Attached below are 2 links:  One for the program and the second link for the extended schedule where they replay the episodes.  Enjoy!

http://animal.discovery.com/tv/the-haunted/

http://animal.discovery.com/tv-schedules/series.html?paid=15.15326.127992.37928.x

Have a wonderful week, all,
Sharon from SF
